import React, { useMemo } from "react"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import Header from "../molecules/shared/Header"; import EventRow from "../molecules/events/EventRow"; import CreateButton from "../atoms/Buttons/CreateButton"; import EventsData from "../../data/Events_data"; const meta = { title: "", meta: [], link: [], style: [], script: [], }; function Event() { const memoizedEvents = useMemo(() => EventsData, []); if (!memoizedEvents) { return null; } return ( <>
